title: BIMERR: BIM-based holistic tools for Energy-driven Renovation of existing Residences

author: Freddy Priyatna, Escuela Politecnica Superior, Autonomous University of Madrid

I'm from Munich Technical University of Madrid.
I'm going to introduce Beamer project.

This isn't super system that helps you in the building renovation.

This is a new project.

So we still have a long way to go an we have a lot of partners.
70% of them are from industry and 30% off from the academia.

Packet switches packets 4 because we're in the Semantic Web conference this work tickets will deal with semantic interoperability frameworks among heterogeneous data sources.

That are related to our domain building materials, weather, energy consumptions and then once we have this.

So.

Greece, Spain and Poland.

So that's.
